page.title: 08Computer Games
page.content: My hobby is playing computer games. My favourite kinds of games are humorous, cartoonistic games, but I like almost any type. My family obtained our computer on Christmas Day as a gift to my Mum. But I got an{interface}and my Dad got a{joystick.}Most of my games are bought but some are copied. There are new peripherals being produced all the time like{ROM cartridges}and {speech synthesizers.}The computer companies are Sinclair, Commodore, Dragon, Oric, Apple & Acorn. My favourite game at the moment is{Daley {Thompson's Decathlon.}It comes in two parts and part one does not load. Part wo consists of the 110 metres hurdles, pole vault, javelin, discus, and the 1500 metres run. To play, you have to get as many points as possible and qualify on each event. I like computer games a lot.
